title: Materials handling methods
brief_description: Shows methods of handling materials in large warehouses and unloading bulky equipment. Illustrates the special applications of two-wheel trucks, four-wheel trucks, dolly trucks, hand-lift trucks, fork lifts, tractor trailers, belt conveyors and straddle trucks.
